title: 3br/2ba ►REMODELED OWNER'S FULL-FLOOR FLAT!
posting_body: ['TO VIEW THIS HOME:', 'Please reply by email to this posting, or call', 'show contact info', 'KEY DETAILS', '•Bedrooms: 3 Bedrooms', '•Bathrooms: 2 Bathrooms', '•Property Type: Flat', '•Laundry: Washer and Dryer in unit', '•Pets Policy: Pets Welcome', '•Walk Score: 92', 'JUST REMODELED, sun-drenched, a Victorian, full-floor, upper flat with high ceilings, in a two-unit private building on a coveted quiet one-way street with easy parking and unbeatable proximity to everything.', 'DESCRIPTION', '•REMODELED, FULL-FLOOR, UPPER FLAT IN A PRIVATE TWO-UNITS BUILDING!', '•Prime location on the border of North Bernal Heights and Inner Mission', '•Victorian Architecture, with high ceilings and desirable open floor plan', '•Hardwood floors throughout the home', "•Remodeled chef's kitchen with all stainless appliances", '•Two renovated, tiled baths', '•Three bedrooms with generous closet spaces (one of the rooms is smaller)', '•In-unit washer and dryer', '•Double pane windows and blinds', '•Recessed and custom lighting throughout the home', '•New exterior paint', '•New interior paint', '•Large and sunny, shared yard', '•Storage Attic and bike racks', '•Views of the downtown skyline', 'LOCATION', "This renovated light-filled Victorian, full-floor flat is in one of the city's most delightful neighborhoods North Bernal Heights near Precita Park and the border of the Inner Mission, surrounded by Victorian homes, on a quiet one-way street with easy parking.", 'A mecca for dog owners, up the block, there is a beautiful path to Bernal Hill; hiking, running, and a dog park with wraparound city views.', 'Trendy restaurants, shopping, and the nightlife of 24th Street and Valencia Street Gourmet Ghetto are within walking distance from your new home.', "Commuters' dream, BART station, is six blocks away, and public transportation is everywhere.", 'Three minutes’ drive to 280 or 101 freeways for a quick commute to the Valley.', 'The financial district is ten minutes away, and many private and tech bus routes are nearby.', 'Walk Score: 92', 'LEASE TERMS', '1.', 'Clean credit.', '2.', "First-month rent and a security deposit of two months' rent.", '3.', 'The lease is for one year.', '4.', 'The move-in date is anytime.', 'If you would like to schedule a private viewing of this home, please respond by email to this posting.']
